webscript.shortname: Gets the status of a signup request
webscript.description:
This webscript retrieves the status of a specific signup process along with various contextual information.

The response will look like: 

{
  "id" : "activiti$1404",
  "key" : "58b8995e-922f-4db4-b46e-7ed407d58efb"},
  "email" : "joe.bloggs@acme-1317661051429.example",
  "isRegistered" : false,
  "isActivated" : true,
  "initiatorFirstName": "Bill",
  "initiatorLastName": "Andersson"
}
id and key identify the workflow and reflect the values passed in the URL. email is the email address being or to be signed up as part of this workflow. Note that if the email is activated, then it is NOT considered to be registered. If the id or key within the GET call are not recognised, this webscript will return a 404.
